items.text: Well we can put some kind of encryption into our requests, for example using RSA we can have a private key, put it into the application, and encrypt the requests.
items.href: How to Send a Semi Secure Request to a Server in Android | by Reza Bigdeli | Medium

items.text: Of course there are some obfuscating approaches, like ProGuard that you should use, but they wouldnâ€™t stop a determined hacker to find our private key in our code.
items.href: How to Send a Semi Secure Request to a Server in Android | by Reza Bigdeli | Medium
